= 1.0.2 - 22 Jan 2020 =
* New Widgets: Pie Chart, Image Accordion

* Testimonial: control modify

= 1.0.1 - 21 Jan 2020 =
* Issues fixed

= 1.0.0 - 19 Jan 2020 =
